TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理客户端身份验证过程中调用的身份验证模块。

span.span: Manages the authentication modules called during the client authentication process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个静态类，用于管理应用程序使用的身份验证模块。 is a static class that manages the authentication modules that an application uses. 当对受保护的资源发出请求时，将 调用 方法以获取 要在后续请求中使用的实例。When a request is made to protected resources, the calls the method to get an instance to use in subsequent requests. 通过 为每个模块调用方法来查询每个已注册的身份验证模块。The queries each registered authentication module by calling the method for each module. 返回实例的第一个身份验证模块 用于对请求进行身份验证。The first authentication module to return an instance is used to authenticate the request. 默认情况下，提供基本、摘要式、协商、NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证类型的模块已注册到 。Modules that provide the basic, digest, negotiate, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication types are registered with the by default. 可使用方法添加实现接口的其他身份验证模块 。Additional authentication modules that implement the interface can be added using the method. 身份验证模块按照它们添加到列表中的顺序进行调用。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. > [!NOTE] > Windows 95/98 或 Windows NT 4.0 不支持 Kerberos 和协商身份验证类型。The Kerberos and negotiate authentication type is not supported on Windows 95/98 or Windows NT 4.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#1)]

related.span: 版本 3.5 SP1 中对 HTTPWebRequest 的 NTLM 身份验证的更改

span.span: Changes to NTLM authentication for HTTPWebRequest in Version 3.5 SP1

summary.span: 调用每个已注册的身份验证模块以查找第一个可响应身份验证请求的模块。

span.span: Calls each registered authentication module to find the first module that can respond to the authentication request.

returns.span: 类的实例，包含授权尝试的结果。

span.span: An instance of the class containing the result of the authorization attempt.

returns.span: 如果没有身份验证模块响应质询，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no authentication module to respond to the challenge, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对 每个已注册的身份验证模块调用方法，直到其中一个模块与 实例响应。The method calls the method on each registered authentication module until one of the module responds with an instance. 返回的第一个 实例用于对请求进行身份验证。The first instance returned is used to authenticate the request. 如果任何身份验证模块都无法对请求进行身份验证，则该 方法将返回 `null` 。If no authentication module can authenticate the request, the method returns `null`. 身份验证模块按照它们向注册的顺序进行调用 。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they are registered with the .

summary.span: 获取或设置凭据策略，该凭据策略将用于使用 类发出的资源请求。

span.span: Gets or sets the credential policy to be used for resource requests made using the class.

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象，该接口确定凭据是否随请求一起发送。

span.span: An object that implements the interface that determines whether credentials are sent with requests.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 凭据策略确定是否在发送网络资源（如网页的内容）的请求时发送凭据。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a request for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果发送了凭据，则需要客户端身份验证的服务器可以尝试在收到请求时对客户端进行身份验证，而不是发送指示需要客户端凭据的响应。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response indicating that the client's credentials are required. 尽管这会将往返过程保存到服务器中，但这必须与通过网络发送凭据的固有安全风险相平衡。While this saves a round trip to the server, this must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 当目标服务器不需要客户端身份验证时，最好不要发送凭据。When the destination server does not require client authentication it is best to not send credentials. 仅为指定凭据或使用指定凭据的对象的请求调用凭据策略 。The credential policy will be called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置凭据策略。The following code example demonstrates setting the credential policy. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取包含服务主体名称 (SPN) 的字典，这些 SPN 用于在 Kerberos 身份验证期间为使用 及其派生类发出的请求标识主机。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains Service Principal Names (SPNs) that are used to identify hosts during Kerberos authentication for requests made using and its derived classes.

value.span: 一个可写的 ，它包含构成主机信息的键的 SPN 值。

span.span: A writable that contains the SPN values for keys composed of host information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPN 是客户端唯一标识服务器上的服务或应用程序实例以进行相互身份验证的名称。An SPN is a name by which a client uniquely identifies an instance of a service or application on a server for purposes of mutual authentication. 默认情况下请求相互身份验证，你可以通过 在请求中将设置为来要求使用身份验证 。Mutual authentication is requested by default, and you can require it by setting to in your request. 当 需要相互身份验证时，客户端必须提供目标的 SPN。When a requires mutual authentication, the SPN for the destination must be supplied by the client. 如果你知道 SPN，则可以在发送请求之前将其添加到中 。If you know the SPN, you can add it to the before sending the request. 如果尚未将 SPN 信息添加到此字典中，则 使用 方法编写最可能的 spn; 但这是一个计算值，可能是不正确的。If you have not added SPN information to this dictionary, the uses the method to compose the most likely SPN; however, this is a computed value and might be incorrect. 如果尝试相互身份验证失败，则可以检查字典，确定计算所得的 SPN。If mutual authentication is attempted and fails, you can check the dictionary to determine the computed SPN. 如果身份验证协议不支持相互身份验证，则不会将 SPN 输入字典。No SPN is entered into the dictionary if the authentication protocol does not support mutual authentication. 若要向此字典添加 SPN 值，请使用的 作为键。To add an SPN value to this dictionary, use the of the as the key. 在内部， 如果不是默认端口，则该密钥将被截断以包括、和。Internally, the key is truncated to include the , , and the if it is not the default port. > [!NOTE] > 访问的方法和属性需要不 受限制 。Accessing the methods and properties of the requires unrestricted . > [!NOTE] > 如果通过代理执行 Kerberos 身份验证，则代理和最终主机名都需要解析为 SPN。When Kerberos authentication is performed through a proxy, both the proxy and the ultimate host name need to be resolved to an SPN. 代理名称解析受超时保护。The proxy name resolution is protected by a timeout. 对 SPN 的最终主机名的解析需要 DNS 查找，并且没有与此操作直接关联的超时。Resolution of the ultimate host name to a SPN requires a DNS lookup, and there is no timeout associated directly with this operation. 因此，同步操作可能需要更长的时间才能超时。Therefore synchronous operations may take longer to timeout. 若要解决此情况，请在向 SPN 缓存发出请求之前，先将其添加到 SPN 缓存。To overcome this, add the ultimate host's URI prefix to the SPN cache prior to making requests to it. 当 未设置属性时，3.5 SP1 现在默认指定在 NTLM（NT LAN 管理器）身份验证交换中 的 SPN 的请求 URL 中使用的主机名。Version 3.5 SP1 now defaults to specifying the host name used in the request URL in the SPN in the NTLM (NT LAN Manager) authentication exchange when the property is not set. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于在客户端请求中的 中指定的主机标头。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the Host header specified in the in the client request. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于服务器的实际主机名、服务器的计算机名、计算机的 IP 地址或环回地址。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the actual host name of the server, the machine name of the server, the computer's IP address, or the loopback address. 在这些情况下，Windows 将无法通过身份验证请求。In these cases, Windows will fail the authentication request. 若要解决此问题，你可能需要通知 Windows 客户端请求中的请求 URL 中使用的主机名 ( "contoso"，例如) 实际上是本地计算机的备用名称。To address the issue, you may need to notify Windows that the host name used in the request URL in the client request ("contoso", for example) is actually an alternate name for the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的内容 。The following code example demonstrates displaying the contents of the . [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#5)]

Public Shared Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ PreAuthenticate(System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
static member PreAuthenticate : System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization
public static System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);

span.span: A to an Internet resource.
The associated with the request.
Preauthenticates a request.

returns.span: 如果可以对请求进行预身份验证，则为 类的实例，否则为 。

span.span: An instance of the class if the request can be preauthenticated; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果身份验证模块可以预身份验证请求，则该 方法将返回身份验证实例，并将授权信息发送到服务器提前，而不是等待资源发出质询。If the authentication module can preauthenticate the request, the method returns an Authentication instance and sends the authorization information to the server preemptively instead of waiting for the resource to issue a challenge. RFC 2617 (HTTP 身份验证：基本和摘要式访问身份验证) 中的3.3 节概述了此行为。This behavior is outlined in section 3.3 of RFC 2617 (HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Access Authentication). 支持预身份验证的身份验证模块允许客户端通过避免由身份验证质询导致的额外往返来提高服务器效率。Authentication modules that support preauthentication allow clients to improve server efficiency by avoiding extra round trips caused by authentication challenges. 可以预身份验证请求的授权模块将 属性设置为 `true` 。Authorization modules that can preauthenticate requests set the property to `true`.

span.span: is .

param.span: 要注册到该身份验证管理器的 。

span.span: The to register with the authentication manager.

summary.span: 向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。

span.span: Registers an authentication module with the authentication manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将身份验证模块添加到由方法调用的模块列表的末尾 。The method adds authentication modules to the end of the list of modules called by the method. 身份验证模块按照它们添加到列表中的顺序进行调用。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. 如果已注册了具有相同的模块 ，则此方法将删除已注册的模块，并将添加 `authenticationModule` 到列表的末尾。If a module with the same is already registered, this method removes the registered module and adds `authenticationModule` to the end of the list. ## Examples 下面的示例向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。The following example registers an authentication module with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一个 实例，该实例可用于读取已注册的身份验证模块的列表。The property provides an instance that enables the list of registered authentication modules to be read. 方法将模块添加到列表中，并且 方法从中移除模块。The method adds modules to the list, and the method removes modules from it. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性获取在身份验证管理器中注册的身份验证模块的列表。The following example uses the property to get a list of authentication modules that are registered with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从方法调用的身份验证模块列表中移除指定的身份验证模块 。The method removes the specified authentication module from the list of authentication modules called by the method. 必须先使用方法将该模块添加到列表 中，然后才能将其从列表中移除。The module must have been added to the list using the method before it can be removed from the list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法从已注册的模块列表中移除指定的身份验证模块。The following example uses the method to remove the specified authentication module from the list of registered modules. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类。For a complete example, refer to the class.
